li.The minor is not open to mathematics or: The minor is not open to mathematics or math education majors.

courseSection0.text: The minor is not open to mathematics or math education majors.

p.Students must satisfy each course's prer: Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.

li.A grade of \"C\" (2.0) or better is requ: A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 6 hours of upper-division cours: At least 6 hours of upper-division courses used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Department of Mathematics.
li.MAC 2311C - Calculus with Analytic Geome: MAC 2311C - Calculus with Analytic Geometry I Credit Hours: 4

courseSection0.text:
Minor Requirements
A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
At least 6 hours of upper-division courses used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Department of Mathematics.

Prerequisite Requirements
Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.
MAC 2311C - Calculus with Analytic Geometry I Credit Hours: 4

courseSection0.text0: MAC2312 - Calculus with Analytic Geometry II (4)
courseSection0.text1: MAC2313 - Calculus with Analytic Geometry III (4)

courseSection1.text0:
Earn at least 3 credits from the following types of courses: 
Select 3 credit hours from 3000 or 4000 level courses offered by the Department of Mathematics
courseSection1.text1:
The following courses CANNOT be used in this minor:

MAS 3106 - Linear Algebra Credit Hours: 4
MHF 3302 - Logic and Proof in Mathematics Credit Hours: 3
MHF 4404 - History of Mathematics Credit Hours: 3
MTG 4212 - Modern Geometries Credit Hours: 4

li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
li.A minimum of 6 credit hours of upper div: A minimum of 6 credit hours of upper division (3000-4999) level coursework must be performed in residence in the Department of Mathematics at UCF.

courseSection1.text:
Other Requirements
Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
A minimum of 6 credit hours of upper division (3000-4999) level coursework must be performed in residence in the Department of Mathematics at UCF.
